body: Unlike the main character from Close as Neighbors who does obscene things and calls it an accident, the main character from Secret Class is complete opposite and is more likeable due to his innocent personality deprived of dirty thoughts. I am really tired of seeing male perverted stereotypical main characters in adult manhwa, so I bet I am going enjoy this manhwa more than Close as Neighbors.
How are you 20 years old with no sexual knowledge?!
